plugin.name: Search Logger
plugin.desc: Log your web searches into Obsidian note.
settings.title: Search Logger Settings
settings.note.name: Log note name
settings.note.desc: Type a name with or without '.md'. We'll append '.md' when you omit it.
settings.error.note.name.rule1: Log note name cannot be empty.
settings.error.note.name.rule2: Log note name must not end with a slash.
settings.error.note.folder.rule2: Parent '${PARENT}' exists but is not a folder.
settings.port.name: Port number
settings.port.desc: Port on localhost Search Logger extension uses (${MIN_PORT}–${MAX_PORT}).
settings.prepend.name: Prepend mode
settings.prepend.desc: When ON, search terms are inserted at the top of the log; when OFF, search terms are appended at the bottom. Inserting at the top could be slow when the log grows.
hotkey.command.name: Open Log Note
